title: How to get 5000 views on my first YouTube video on motivation rap - Quora

response.answer_text: Tip #1: Use social networking to reach out to more audience and get the views Tip #2: Try finding forums where people talk about Motivational stuff like - Getting into shape or Going for rides etc. But please beware to not use the forums just to market your video, you should also try to give other valuable input. Tip #3: Make sure your You Tube channel art, icons etc are presentable, if not the audience you get from above tips would be the only one’s. It might not propel new users.

Again and again share with your friends on Facebook I said again and again ask him to watch In 5–6 times he will watch atleast one tine if he like then will share on profile then continue this trick will work
